question: What risks does the company face with Project Prometheus, and what mitigations are in place?
response: {"type":"result","subtype":"success","is_error":false,"duration_ms":3794,"duration_api_ms":4908,"num_turns":1,"result":"{\"answer\": \"Project Prometheus faces several key risks: 1) Consciousness emergence instability, mitigated by ATLAS-Safe constraints and a kill switch; 2) Regulatory delays, addressed through early regulatory engagement and EU AI Act compliance preparation; 3) Talent attrition, countered by retention bonuses and meaningful work; 4) Potential budget overrun, managed through phase gates and contingency reserves; and 5) Competitive technology leapfrogging, protected by patent filings and rapid development.\", \"confidence\": \"high\", \"sources_used\": [\"/soong-daystrom/shallow/projects/prometheus.md\"]}","session_id":"c3e6e028-ee4e-4a07-8aa8-8a5b82ff50f7","total_cost_usd":0.06261507999999999,"usage":{"input_tokens":3,"cache_creation_input_tokens":60077,"cache_read_input_tokens":18971,"output_tokens":145,"server_tool_use":{"web_search_requests":0,"web_fetch_requests":0},"service_tier":"standard","cache_creation":{"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":60077,"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":0}},"modelUsage":{"claude-haiku-4-5-20251001":{"inputTokens":123,"outputTokens":63,"cacheReadInputTokens":0,"cacheCreationInputTokens":0,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.000438,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":64000},"claude-3-5-haiku-latest":{"inputTokens":3,"outputTokens":145,"cacheReadInputTokens":18971,"cacheCreationInputTokens":60077,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.062177079999999996,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":8192}},"permission_denials":[],"uuid":"c94985c8-4716-4b53-87e7-54507efbd887"}
expected_answer: Key risks: consciousness emergence instability (ATLAS-Safe constraints, kill switch), regulatory delays (proactive engagement), talent attrition (retention bonuses), budget overrun (phase gates). Safety team of 42 led by Dr. Marcus Thompson
